```{r}
map <- rgdal::readOGR("/home/gregg/countries.geo.json", "OGRGeoJSON")
View(map)
map@data$year <- allOlympics$Year
map@data$year <- allOlympics$Year
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)

bins <- seq(0, 108, 12)
pal  <- colorBin("YlOrRd", map@data$value, bins)

leaflet(data = map) %>%
  addTiles()        %>%
  addPolygons(fillColor = ~pal(value))
```
